revised_title: Phosphorylation and the Control of Calcium Fluxes in Cells
tldr: This article discusses how protein phosphorylation plays a crucial role in regulating calcium fluxes in cells. It explains how the increase in cytosolic calcium concentration is controlled by ATP-dependent calcium efflux mechanisms. The article also focuses on the role of protein kinases in controlling calcium influx and efflux, particularly in cardiac muscle cells.
